string-array.name: createTableSql
string-array.item: Create TABLE MAIN.[BaseBarCode]([BarCode] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE ,[GoodsName] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE ,[ColorCode] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE ,[ColorName] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE ,[SizeCode] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE ,[SizeName] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE ,[Category] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE ,[SmallCategory] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE ,[Long] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE ,[Brand] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE ,[StandardPrice] decimal DEFAULT 0 ,[UpdateTimestamp] bigint DEFAULT 0 ,[CreateTime] datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME(\'now\', \'localtime\')) ,[EditTime] datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT (DATETIME(\'now\', \'localtime\')))
